title: beautiful script [for wedding invite]
content:
Any suggestions for a good script please!  
Anything along the lines of [Affair from Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021055811/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181)

thanks in advance!
author: elsac

comments.content:
...along the lines of Affair...

anything by [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021055811/http:/www.sudtipos.com.ar/fonts2.htm)
